=== Problem ===
Rhythmbox is a great music library/player for gnome, installed by default in Ubuntu. However, it is by far the ugliest GNOME app. The layout wastes a lot of space and is unintuitive. I would like it if the Ubuntu community could discuss and experiment with different layout ideas.

''On launchpad: https://bugs.launchpad.net/rhythmbox/+bug/410792''
